projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with real-time inventory
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern technologies. Features include real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, advanced search and filtering, user authentication, admin dashboard, and responsive design. Implemented using microservices architecture for scalability.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile app for team collaboration
projects.longDescription: A feature-rich task management application designed for teams. Includes real-time collaboration, file sharing, deadline tracking, project analytics, push notifications, and offline sync capabilities. Built with React Native for cross-platform compatibility.

projects.title: GraphQL API Gateway
projects.description: Scalable microservices API with real-time subscriptions
projects.longDescription: A robust GraphQL API gateway that unifies multiple microservices. Features include schema stitching, real-time subscriptions, rate limiting, authentication middleware, caching strategies, and comprehensive logging. Deployed using Docker and Kubernetes.

projects.title: Open Source Design System
projects.description: Comprehensive React component library with Storybook
projects.longDescription: A production-ready design system and component library used by multiple organizations. Includes 50+ components, comprehensive documentation, accessibility features, theme customization, and automated testing. Published as an npm package with weekly updates.

about.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud architecture, and creating exceptional user experiences. Always exploring new technologies and contributing to open source.
about.experience: 8+ years of professional development experience, leading teams and delivering high-impact projects for startups and enterprise clients.
